questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: My son went in Democratic Republic of Congo .He received a coq. In the night he took a pot ,for his coq to made his toilette,but in the morning he found nothing in the pot ,my son was sad he went and bring water so his coq can wash his body but his coq could't.He was cring but at his age of 5 year he coul't know that animal can't do toilette as human being.
